SELECT STUDENT_CODE , STUDENT_NAME , STUDENT_YEAR , DECODE(STUDENT_GENDER, 'W', '여', '남') AS STUDENT_GENDER
FROM STUDENT STU
WHERE STUDENT_NAME LIKE '%' || #{studentName} || '%'
ORDER BY STUDENT_CODE ASC

SELECT STUDENT_CODE , STUDENT_NAME , TO_CHAR(BIRTHDAY, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BIRTHDAY , STUDENT_YEAR , ADDR||' ' ||ADDR_DETAIL AS ADDR , STUDENT_TELL , TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS REG_DATE , DECODE(STUDENT_GENDER, 'W', '여', '남') AS STUDENT_GENDER
FROM STUDENT WHERE STUDENT_CODE = #{studentCode}

SELECT S.STUDENT_CODE , STUDENT_NAME , STUDENT_YEAR , STUDENT_GENDER , STUDENT_LESSON_CODE , L.LESSON_INFO_CODE , (SELECT SUBJECT_NAME FROM SUBJECT WHERE SUBJECT_CODE = L.SUBJECT_CODE) AS SUBJECT_NAME , (SELECT STEP_NAME FROM STEP WHERE STEP_CODE = L.STEP_CODE) AS STEP_NAME , YEAR FROM LESSON_INFO L, STUDENT_LESSON_INFO SL , STUDENT S WHERE L.LESSON_INFO_CODE = SL.LESSON_INFO_CODE AND S.STUDENT_CODE = SL.STUDENT_CODE
